user_query: I'm looking for the lyrics and preview of a popular song in Indonesia. Can you find me the song information and the artist details? Additionally, I would like to know the top 10 songs in Austria on May 7th, 2022.

TaskList.description: Find the lyrics and preview of a popular song in Indonesia.
Get information about the song and the artist details.
Retrieve the top 10 songs in Austria on May 7th, 2022.
